original_title: Out of Our Heads: A Male Journey into the Heart
overview: Out of Our Heads: A Male Journey into the Heart is a call to action for men who want to break out of their apathy, create more meaning in their lives, or simply connect more with other men â€“ and be fed by an authentic, creative, supportive male community.  Using poetry, myth, ritual and community-building exercises, the Men's Wisdom Council creates a safe container in which men can share their deepest emotions, heal old wounds, and develop a bigger dream to move them forward in life.
title: Out of Our Heads: A Male Journey into the Heart
